title: Consider the Impact of Strategy
text: Think about how an effective data management strategy can reduce the need for additional spending.

title: Evaluate the Role of Data Management
text: An effective data management strategy can streamline processes, reduce redundancies, and enhance security, leading to cost savings.

hintAnswer: data management strategy is becoming effective
title: Identify the Effective Element
text: If you observe a reduction in the number of times you need to allocate more funds to security and storage, it might indicate that your $$___$$ is becoming effective.
choices: data management strategy is becoming effective
